features: 【2022 Version Microwave Rack】Easier to assemble, stronger and stronger. The microwave stand can hold up to 50 kg (110 lb). And its own weight is only 6.45 pounds. It is strong enough to hold microwaves and other kitchen items such as cutlery, spices, canned food, condiments, bottles, plates, pots and pans.

【Easier to install】Compared with other brands, it adopts an assembled base structure, saying goodbye to the obscure instructions and cumbersome installation steps, it is assembled with a snap-in structure, reinforced with a few screws, and it only takes a few minutes for one person to easily To achieve the installation of this microwave shelf.

【Expandable microwave oven rack】The length of the microwave oven rack can be adjusted from 40~60cm (15.74"-23.62"). The upper and lower heights are adjustable by 2.16 inches, and the shelves allow you to easily store your microwave or other kitchen utensils, making your kitchen cleaner and tidy.

【Multifunctional】Shelves are suitable for your kitchen, wardrobe, garage, shower and other storage areas. The included 3 removable hooks are a bonus for storing oven mitts, kitchen utensils or towels.
【SALE-SERVICE】If you have any questions about the product or installation, please feel free to contact us and we will help you out within 12 hours!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Multi-Function Shelf Unit Taglines is a home brand that specializes in kitchen storage, focusing on providing customers with high quality home furnishings with design and materials. Committed to providing a comfortable quality of life for every family, the products are loved by consumers. Multi-function rack unit can be used in various ways. Place the microwave at the top or bottom of the shelf unit and use additional shelf space to store canned food, snacks, spices and other kitchen items. It can also be used as a storage shelf for bathrooms, offices, lounges, garages and many other places in the .It can effectively organize dishes and organize your kitchen.
Manufactured by advanced technology The surface of the microwave oven frame is painted with anti-oxidation rust and high stability.

Anti-slip Design We use non-slip design to ensure product stability. Sturdy hooks for free Equipped with three strong hooks, it is ideal for hanging towels, oven gloves, kitchen utensils, accessories, etc. Let your kitchen utensils no longer have nowhere to be placed. strong carrying capacity Taglines microwave oven rack has a strong load capacity of 25kg. Seasonings, cutlery, and even microwave ovens can be placed on the top shelf! Retractable design Retractable design, easy to adjust, just adjust the bracket to adapt to different sizes of microwave ovens, providing additional storage space. installation Taglines extendable kitchen counter shelf comes with the tools and the instruction included, installation can be finished very soon. Unlike the microwave shelf wall mounts, no drilling is required! The shelf can be placed on any flat surface and can be easily cleaned up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for making space on the counter
reviews.reviewText: I had trouble putting this together the first time. So I emailed the vendor and was amazed that they got right back to me as quickly as they did. They even contacted me a 2nd time to check that everything was ok! Turns out this unit is very easy to put together. it took me about 30 minutes and that is with looking at the diagram and watching the video that was provided as I put the shelf together. It probably could have been done in less time, but for some reason, I had the dropsies and kept dropping if not the screws the hex tool to screw them. It was amazingly simple but you have to lay your pieces out like in the video so you don't put things backward or upside down as I did. I discovered these things before I tightened the shelf for the final time so it was no problem to unscrew them and place them correctly. One other thing I found useful was a measuring tape to make sure the legs were even and that I didn't overextend the shelf. I think that if you overextend the shelf and while it would work for holding lighter items it wouldn't keep the 55lb capacity. I could have used a level to make sure it was balanced but I couldn't find it. One thing that might have helped the first time was to have known that the C and D rods are switched in the instructions.For the price, it seems like a decent and sturdy enough shelf. My heaviest items are on my counter while I put medium-weight things on top. I think I could use heavier items but don't have any plans to.I am pleased with my purchase as it satisfies my goal of clearing space on the kitchen counter of my tiny apartment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This shelf is solid! Well-engineered for many uses
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to house my microwave, electric tea kettle, and toaster oven. However, I misunderstood the measurements. I thought I could adjust the vertical height of the frame. Although the width of the unit is adjustable horizontally, and shelf placement is adjustable vertically, the total height of the unit is not adjustable. I did not have clearance underneath my cabinets to accommodate the entire unit.Because I don't have vertical space near the only electrical outlet in my tiny kitchen, I am using it to open up counter space where I do have more vertical room.I'm still giving it five stars. It is a solid product. It was easy to put together and it is built to last. It's extremely versatile and can be used in all kinds of space-saving placements. The included hooks hold my keys and utensils and dog leashes at the end of my counter. Overall, an excellent product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my RV
reviews.reviewText: We are living in our small RV while we build a home, and space is at a premium. This help gave us back some counter space that we really needed. The shelf is really nicely built and sturdy, and has plenty of room on the shelf and below. I definitely recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Useful, but difficult assembly
reviews.reviewText: Pros: works great as a space saver in my small apartment kitchen. My toaster oven fits the bottom area perfectly, and my microwave utilizes the top space just fine. The appliances are able to be stored on this rack without compromising their functionality.Cons: kind of wobbly, very difficult to assemble. Honestly, the assembly wasn't "technically" difficult as a whole, but the instructions SUCKED. There were just photos and numbered parts, which is fine, but it felt like the instructions were incomplete and lacking info. Once you figure it out though, you got it. The wobbliness could likely be fixed fairly easily by using a leveling device to level out the rack. Since it stretches to expand/collapse as needed, it does not lay perfectly - which is where the leveler could make a difference.Overall, the value for the money IS THERE. If you are looking for a way to save space, THIS IS IT. I love the versatility of this rack, and the ability to expand/collapse as needed for size requirements.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We love it
reviews.reviewText: This is over my microwave in my basement. It’s to hold stuff for the kiddos. Super easy to pull together and fit around my small appliance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Exceeded my expectations. Very sturdy and very nice. I am very satisfied with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars More counter space!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I don't have a lot of counter space and have been looking for a solution to house my kitchen appliances. This shelf is sturdy and gave me the space I needed. The width is adjustable so really helpful in saving a few extra inches on my counter and provides the flexibility to rotate different appliances under and on top. The instructions were a little vague but it wasn't difficult to figure out. It was a little awkward building it but didn't take very long. I'd recommend measuring your height of the items to ensure proper fit. The top shelf has three heights available but if your cabinets are low the top settings are not ideal, unless your storing flat trays. Overall I'd say it was well worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Shelf not for heavy items
reviews.reviewText: Terrible directions for assembly. Not that you can’t figure it out, but a tiny bit more effort to improve the instructions would save time for the customer assembling it. One of the plastic pieces that screws together two bars broke while I was tightening it. I turned it too far because it didn’t seem tight. It should hold together since it is screwed in on either end, but I used some tape to be sure. Fortunately it is behind the microwave so it’s not seen. Now that it’s set up it is nice to have the shelf space, and we’re not using it for anything heavy. But it’s not the best quality. We wanted to use the 24” width but if you want to use it for a smaller space it might be sturdier.
